title: LOL is invisible
body: I one day tried to open LoL game launcher and it was invisible. I can still interact with the program however, i can not see what i am clicking on.

replies.body:
This is a pretty rare issue and there's a number of different things that could cause something like this. It seems like your client is able to launch okay, but for some reason it's not able to draw any of the images to the screen. 

Let's go through the steps in our [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) first to make sure your OS isn't blocking anything.
